title: Coin

Apple’s coin has the text "The Crazy Ones," a reference to its 1997–2002 Crazy Ones/Think Different ad campaign and commonly used as placeholder text in Apple icons and emoji designs.
apple_vendor_description: The coin emoji on Apple devices gleams with a metallic luster, appearing as a polished, circular token of value. Its surface exhibits subtle highlights and shadows, indicative of Apple's signature realistic lighting and 3D rendering, suggesting a tangible, substantial feel. This emoji frequently symbolizes wealth, finance, payment, or a successful transaction, adding a touch of financial significance to digital conversations on Apple devices.
